subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games (2008)
Floods
lead_paragraph: It did not take long for Shawn Johnson, the favorite to win the all-around in Beijing, to recover from the loss of her gym to floodwaters in Iowa.
snippet: It did not take long for Shawn Johnson, the favorite to win the all-around in Beijing, to recover from the loss of her gym to floodwaters in Iowa.
